abstract: Driven column reviews Ford Fusion Hybrid.

headline.print_headline: Ford Fusion Hybrid: A Fuel Saver That’s Roomy and Refined
headline.main: Video Review: Ford Fusion Hybrid Combines Savings and Style

snippet: The Fusion may not be as miserly on gasoline as the Toyota Prius, but the Ford has the handsome chiseled lines that many hybrids lack....
lead_paragraph: The Fusion may not be as miserly on gasoline as the Toyota Prius, but the Ford has the handsome chiseled lines that many hybrids lack.
